title: Lag, Disconnecting Frequently 11/11/2017
body:
My MS is usually 60, today I've been getting really annoyed at the amount of lag spikes I've been experiencing, also a few  disconnects.   The spikes generally send me between 200-1999 MS.  Which for me is relatively new,  I don't think I've ever been so frustrated playing LoL  I've lost 3 ranked games in a row over it.  

Assuming it would get better, it seems to be only getting worse.   

I've restarted the client, I've checked my Task Manager to see if I had any processes or background downloads going, nothing at all. I've flushed my IP and that didn't seem to help as I jumped into an ARAM game, that went horribly, one of our players hadn't connected, one disconnected halfway through, and I was still getting major MS spikes. I tried using the speed tester

I then tried opening my browser while I was experiencing a spike in latency, running videos on youtube at 1080p, they're loading and buffering fine with smooth playback.  So what the heck?
Has anyone been having issues with in-game (after starting a match) connectivity?  I don't really want to re-install the client. Also, it was running perfectly fine yesterday and I was climbing steadily. 

{{champion:238}} {{item:3070}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Since there's obviously no issue connecting with other sites like Youtube, something might be interfering with LoL's connection specifically.

Let's start with a Traceroute to see what might be getting in the way! We suggest using [**WinMTR**](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to trace the ping back to our NA server (IP Address for that is 104.160.131.1 ). Once you have the data from that trace, take a screen shot of it and show it to me here, or better yet take it to our Tech savvy support team for in depth help [**via a ticket over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

my internet works just fine. But in the start of a game it disconnects. this issues is stuck with me for over a week now an i can't get rid of it.
i posted a ticket but no one responded i don't know if this is the last time i'll be playing league or not. Please help me!
did you get the attempting to reconnect message? this has been happening to me for the past 4 days i dont know what to do {{item:3070}}
This crap has been happening to me all morning.think mine is worse though mine spikes me to 8 million and has me attempting to reconnect in-game for several mins at a time.
